item.title: Launching Robonomics collator in Docker
item.author: a.khssnv@gmail.com (Alisher A. Khassanov)
item.description: In the official guide on collator setup it is proposed to build your own Robonomics node binary or use one from the latest release published. Docker is not proposed while the latest version at Docker Hub was a half year ago. The reason is a build issue in CI pipeline, it is already reported in Issue #232. However it is pretty easy to repeat the same steps CI does to build your own Docker image.
